resource.name: MU_20_LEDStreetlights
resource.description:
Location of LED streetlights installed in 2016.

Attribute descriptions:
LEDWATTAGE: The wattage of the light
LEDDISTRIB: Number used to identify areas
THE_GEOM: Indicates type of feature
OBJECTID: Auto generated ID number
LEDFIXTURE: The model number of the light
LEDID: Number to identify each light
DATE_: Date of install
X_COOR: X coordinate for light
Y_COOR: Y coordinate for light
resource.attribution: Municipality of the County of Annapolis

resource.name: Statistics Canada Building Permit Survey Data - Section D
resource.description:
Building permit data for Statistics Canada Building Permit Survey (BDP) Section D: Residential Demolitions. Section D includes all permits for residential demolitions.

Data will only be made available for Municipalities that have signed an agreement to release their municipal permit data on datazONE.
columns_description: Provides the total number of units demolished for seasonal/cottage dwellings
Provides the total number of units demolished for single detached dwellings
Name of the municipal unit
Provides the total number of units demolished for semi-detached dwellings
Provides the total number of units demolished for multi-unit/apartment dwellings
Provides the total number of units demolished for row-house dwellings
Date data was extracted for publication

resource.name: MU_20_Fire_Hydrants
resource.description:
Location of fire hydrants within the municipal water supply systems for Annapolis County.

Attribute descriptions:
OBJECTID: Auto generated ID number
LOCDESC: Brief description on location of fire hydrant
FACILITYID: System code and hydrant number within that system
THE_GEOM: Type of feature
TECH: Name of technician
STREET: Street that hydrant is on
SYSTEM: Water system
X_COORD: GPS X coordinate for location
Y_COORD: GPS Y coordinate for location
STATUS: Active
resource.attribution: Municipality of the County of Annapolis

resource.name: CBRM_Buildings
resource.description:
The dataset contains the building footprints of all buildings in the CBRM as polygons. Along with the spatial information, the dataset also includes specific attributes of the buildings such as building description, class, and building name.
Attribute descriptions:
THE_GEOM: Building polygon geometry
CODE1: Identifies the building uses
CODE2: Identifies the building uses if more than 1
CODE3: Identifies the building uses if more than 2
CODE4: Identifies the building uses if more than 3
CODE5: Identifies the building uses if more than 4
CODE6: Identifies the building uses if more than 5
CODE7: Identifies the building uses if more than 6
CODE8: Identifies the building uses if more than 7
CODE9: Identifies the building uses if more than 8
CODE10: Identifies the building uses if more than 9
DESCRIP1: Description of building
DESCRIP2: Description of building if more than 1
DESCRIP3: Description of building if more than 2
NAME: Name of building if exists
GEN_CLASS: General class of building
GEN_CLASS2: Secondary general class of building
DB_UPDATED: Last date the attributes were updated
GR_UPDATED: Last date the geometry was updated

domain_metadata.value: https://www.pvsc.ca/en/home/datazone/datazone-license.aspx
Open Data & Information Government Licence – PVSC & Participating Municipalities
Cape Breton Regional Municipality (CBRM)
Cape Breton Regional Municipality (CBRM)

resource.name: Statistics Canada Building Permit Survey Data - Section C
resource.description:
Building permit data for Statistics Canada Building Permit Survey (BDP) Section C: Minor Non-Residential Projects. Section C includes all permits for minor non-residential projects with a value of less than $250 000.

Data will only be made available for Municipalities that have signed an agreement to release their municipal permit data on datazONE.
columns_description: Provides the number of permits matching the specified structure and dwelling type
Date data was extracted for publication
Describes the non-residential use of the building using StatCan BDP Survey definitions
Name of the municipal unit
Provides a subtotal for the value of permits matching the specified structure and dwelling type
Describes the type of activity covered by the permit using StatCan BDP Survey definitions

resource.name: Parcel Land Sizes
resource.description:
This dataset contains all assessment account numbers and associated land sizes and civic addresses with geographic coordinates.

Note: Only one civic address is displayed per property. There are properties with multiple civic addresses.
columns_description: Nova Scotia Municipality
Street direction e.g. East - E
Concatenated latitude and longitude for displaying on a map
Longitude
Latitude
Additional address information such as a unit or suite number
Unique number assigned to each assessed property
